thread.title: Watch: Steve Bannon gives first remarks since Cambridge Analytica scandal

title: Watch: Steve Bannon gives first remarks since Cambridge Analytica scandal
text:
Watch: Steve Bannon gives first remarks since Cambridge Analytica scandal 47 Mins Ago Breaking News 
[The stream is slated to start at 4:50 p.m. ET. Please refresh the page if you do not see a player above at that time.] 
Steve Bannon is set to speak on Thursday at the Financial Times Future of News event. 
Bannon previously held the roles of chief White House strategist, chief executive of right-wing news site Breitbart and executive at scandal-plagued analytics firm Cambridge Analytica. CNBC NEWSLETTERS
